title: Gerst Script/Vintage/Beer Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gerst_4568.jpg)
 Thank you very much for your contributions, effort, time, etc.

I LOVE this site...just came across it & am thrilled to continue my passion & learning of typography. Have a great weekend.
author: orangetank

comments.content:
Hand drawn, with a basis in Roundhand Script.

This particular style—with a tail originating from the final letter that serves as an underline—is sometimes referred to as baseball script, and has been undergoing a resurgence lately.

Some digital typefaces that mimic the look:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/licious-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/licious-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/licious-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/grocers-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/grocers-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/grocers-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer-classic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer-classic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer-classic/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/draft-beer/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/bambola/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/bambola/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/bambola/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/brewmaster/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/brewmaster/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/brewmaster/")

All are good suggestions, but I am drawn to Nick's Moonshine Script

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MoonshineScriptNFAsGerst_5764.gif)
  
More LHF Ballpark [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ballpark-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ballpark-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ballpark-script/")  
Home Run [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162829/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/")  
Don
